But for me Tron is a coin with high transaction fees compared to others. If we talk about cheap transaction fees, don't look at the amount in stable coins, but how much fees we spend in the coins themselves. In general, the transaction fee on the Tron blockchain for each token transaction is 0.7 to 1 TRX. While other blockchains transaction fees are 0.001 to 0.003. Yes. If we convert to dollars, of course the costs on other blockchains are much higher, because the price of the base coin is already very high.
